class.name: voltage_controllers/JointVoltageController
class.description: The JointVoltageController sends open-loop voltage/pwm commands. It expects a VoltageJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: voltage_controllers/JointGroupVoltageController
class.description: The JointGroupVoltageController sends open-loop voltage/pwm commands for a set of joints. It expects a VoltageJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: voltage_controllers/GripperActionController
class.description: The GripperActionController sends open-loop voltage/pwm commands for a single dof joint. It expects a VoltageJointInterface type of hardware interface.
